bib.title: Wordnet-based Similarity Measure for Polish Short Texts
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Gut, Anna
bib.abstract: We present a method for computing semantic similarity of Polish text with main focus given to short texts. We took into account the limited set of language tools for Polish, especially the not sufficient development of syntactic and semantic parsers. plWordNet is used to construct meaning representations for words in such a way that different words of the similar meaning receive similar representation. The use of a Word Sense Disambiguation tool for Polish brought positive results in one of the method variants in spite of the limited accuracy of the
